Title: Bar charts in Dashboard.
introduction:
We just shipped bar charts to the Dashboard on Keywords AI (YC W24)! 

 Why bar charts? 

 Line graphs are great for trends, but when you're working with discrete time buckets — like hourly traffic or error counts — bar charts are much easier to read. You can quickly spot spikes, compare values, and get a clear sense of what's happening. 

 Some common use cases: 
- See traffic by hour more clearly 
- Catch error spikes at a glance 
- Understand how prompt and completion tokens change over time 

 You can turn it on in: 

 Settings → Preferences → Show bar chart

New.description: Added generation time filter. You can now filter logs by response time.
Added cache hit rate aggregation metrics.

Improved.description: Improved histogram chart display for better data visualization.

Fixed.description: Fixed a bug where previous period data displayed incorrectly in charts.
Fixed a bug where the clear all filters button didn't work.
Fixed a bug where data export progress remained stuck at 0%.
Fixed a bug where Google login failed to authenticate users.
